entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
